TMatrix_as.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001                         /* Sparse symmetric matrices in triplet format */
00002 #include "TMatrix_as.h"
00003 
00004 
00005 #define DECLARE_AND_GET_X_SLOT(__C_TYPE, __SEXP)        \
00006     __C_TYPE *xx = __SEXP(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym))
00007 
00008 #define MAYBE_DECLARE_AND_GET_X_SLOT(__T__, __S__)      \
00009               DECLARE_AND_GET_X_SLOT(__T__, __S__)
00010 
00011 #define Matrix_T_as_DENSE(_C_TYPE_, _SEXP_, _SEXPTYPE_)                 \
00012     SEXP dimP = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym),                             \
00013           xiP = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_iSym);                               \
00014     int k, n = INTEGER(dimP)[0], nnz = length(xiP);                     \
00015     int *xi = INTEGER(xiP), *xj = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_jSym)),    \
00016         sz = n * n;                                                     \
00017     _C_TYPE_ *tx = _SEXP_(ALLOC_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym, _SEXPTYPE_, sz)); \
00018     MAYBE_DECLARE_AND_GET_X_SLOT(_C_TYPE_, _SEXP_);                     \
00019                                                                         \
00020     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimSym, duplicate(dimP));                      \
00021     SET_DimNames(val, x);                                               \
00022     slot_dup(val, x, Matrix_uploSym)
00023 
00024 #define Matrix_T_as_DENSE_FINISH(_X_k_)         \
00025     AZERO(tx, sz);                              \
00026     for (k = 0; k < nnz; k++)                   \
00027         tx[xi[k] + xj[k] * n] = _X_k_;          \
00028     UNPROTECT(1);                               \
00029     return val
00030 
00031 
00032 SEXP dsTMatrix_as_dsyMatrix(SEXP x)
00033 {
00034     SEXP val = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dsyMatrix")));
00035 
00036     Matrix_T_as_DENSE(double, REAL, REALSXP);
00037     Matrix_T_as_DENSE_FINISH(xx[k]);
00038 }
00039 
00040 SEXP lsTMatrix_as_lsyMatrix(SEXP x)
00041 {
00042     SEXP val = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("lsyMatrix")));
00043 
00044     Matrix_T_as_DENSE(int, LOGICAL, LGLSXP);
00045     Matrix_T_as_DENSE_FINISH(xx[k]);
00046 }

00048 /* ---- Now the triangular ones --  have an extra  'diag'  slot : ------ */
00049 
00050 SEXP dtTMatrix_as_dtrMatrix(SEXP x)
00051 {
00052     SEXP val = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dtrMatrix")));
00053 
00054     Matrix_T_as_DENSE(double, REAL, REALSXP);
00055     slot_dup(val, x, Matrix_diagSym);
00056     Matrix_T_as_DENSE_FINISH(xx[k]);
00057 }

00059 SEXP ltTMatrix_as_ltrMatrix(SEXP x)
00060 {
00061     SEXP val = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("ltrMatrix")));
00062 
00063     Matrix_T_as_DENSE(int, LOGICAL, LGLSXP);
00064     slot_dup(val, x, Matrix_diagSym);
00065     Matrix_T_as_DENSE_FINISH(xx[k]);
00066 }

00068 /*===================== Coercion to  gTMatrix ================================*/
00069 
00070 #undef  MAYBE_DECLARE_AND_GET_X_SLOT
00071 #define MAYBE_DECLARE_AND_GET_X_SLOT(__T__, __S__)              \
00072               DECLARE_AND_GET_X_SLOT(__T__, __S__), *vx
00073 
00074 #define ALLOC_val_x_SLOT(__SEXP__, __S_TYPE__)                  \
00075     vx = __SEXP__(ALLOC_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym,__S_TYPE__, nv))
00076 
00077 #define MAYBE_ALLOC_val_x_SLOT(_S1_, _S2_)      \
00078               ALLOC_val_x_SLOT(_S1_, _S2_)
00079 
00080 #define MEMCPY_x_SLOT           Memcpy(&vx[nv], xx, nnz)
00081 #define MAYBE_MEMCPY_x_SLOT     MEMCPY_x_SLOT
00082 
00083 #define SET_x_SLOT              vx[nv] = xx[i]
00084 #define MAYBE_SET_x_SLOT        SET_x_SLOT
00085 
00086 #define Matrix_T_as_GENERAL(_C_TYPE_, _SEXP_, _SEXPTYPE_)               \
00087     SEXP xiP = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_iSym);                                \
00088     /* , uplo = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_uploSym); */                         \
00089     int i, nnz = length(xiP), n0d, nv,                                  \
00090         *xi = INTEGER(xiP),                                             \
00091         *xj = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_jSym)),                        \
00092         *vi, *vj;                                                       \
00093     MAYBE_DECLARE_AND_GET_X_SLOT(_C_TYPE_, _SEXP_);                     \
00094                                                                         \
00095     /* Find *length* of result slots: */                                \
00096     /*  = 2 * nnz - n0d; n0d := #{non-0 diagonals} :*/                  \
00097     for(i = 0, n0d = 0; i < nnz; i++)                                   \
00098         if(xi[i] == xj[i]) n0d++ ;                                      \
00099     nv = 2 * nnz - n0d;                                                 \
00100                                                                         \
00101     vi = INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(val, Matrix_iSym, INTSXP, nv));             \
00102     vj = INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(val, Matrix_jSym, INTSXP, nv));             \
00103     MAYBE_ALLOC_val_x_SLOT(_SEXP_, _SEXPTYPE_);                         \
00104                                                                         \
00105     slot_dup(val, x, Matrix_DimSym); \
00106     SET_DimNames(val, x);                                               \
00107     /* copy the upper/lower triangle (including the diagonal)*/         \
00108     /* "at end" ([nv]): */                                              \
00109     nv = nnz - n0d;                                                     \
00110     Memcpy(&vi[nv], xi, nnz);                                           \
00111     Memcpy(&vj[nv], xj, nnz);                                           \
00112     MAYBE_MEMCPY_x_SLOT;                                                \
00113                                                                         \
00114     for(i = 0, nv = 0; i < nnz; i++) { /* copy the other triangle */    \
00115         if(xi[i] != xj[i]) { /* but not the diagonal */                 \
00116             vi[nv] = xj[i];                                             \
00117             vj[nv] = xi[i];                                             \
00118             MAYBE_SET_x_SLOT;                                           \
00119             nv++;                                                       \
00120         }                                                               \
00121     }                                                                   \
00122                                                                         \
00123     UNPROTECT(1);                                                       \
00124     return val
00125

00127 /* this corresponds to changing 'stype' of a cholmod_triplet;
00128  * seems not available there */
00129 SEXP dsTMatrix_as_dgTMatrix(SEXP x)
00130 {
00131     SEXP val = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dgTMatrix")));
00132     Matrix_T_as_GENERAL(double, REAL, REALSXP);
00133 }
